word: “HIS SUFFERINGS WERE OVER. AT AN EARLY HOUR HIS WORK ON EARTH HAD ENDED. IT WAS INDEED A TRYING DAY FOR THE AFFLICTED FAMILY, YET THEY WERE SUSTAINED BY THE THOUGHT THAT THEIR DEAR SON AND BROTHER WAS ENABLED TO CALMLY RESIGN HIMSELF INTO THE HANDS OF HIS HEAVENLY FATHER; THAT THE PRESENCE OF THE SAVIOUR CHEERED HIM AS HE ENTERED THE DARK VALLEY, AND THAT HENCEFORTH THERE WAS LAID UP FOR HIM A CROWN OF RIGHTEOUSNESS.
